entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
CALM WINDS
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
